responsibilities: • Build highly scalable machine learning systems and state-of-the-art machine learning models to improve ads ranking quality and optimize advertisers' marketing strategies.
• Explore, develop and experiment with new features to improve model accuracy.
• Understand ads platform objectives and leverage modern machine learning to enhance ads relevance, quality, and quantity delivered to end-users.
• Collaborate with Product Managers, Designers, and other disciplines to explore the next generation of shopping experiences on TikTok.
qualifications: • Proficiency in building scalable machine learning systems.
• Expertise in developing state-of-the-art machine learning models.
• Ability to experiment with and develop new features for model accuracy improvement.
• Strong understanding of ads platform objectives and modern machine learning techniques.
• Excellent collaboration skills with cross-functional teams, including Product Managers and Designers.
analysis:
The job responsibilities and skills focus on building scalable machine learning systems and developing state-of-the-art machine learning models to improve ads ranking quality and optimize marketing strategies. The responsibilities include exploring new features to improve model accuracy and leveraging modern machine learning techniques to enhance ads relevance and quality. The skills required include proficiency in building scalable machine learning systems, expertise in developing machine learning models, and a strong understanding of ads platform objectives.

There is no explicit mention of Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus is primarily on machine learning systems related to ads ranking and marketing strategies, which do not necessarily imply the use of GenAI or LLMs. While it's possible that some machine learning techniques could involve language models, the job description does not specifically indicate this.

Therefore, based on the provided information, it does not appear that the job involves working with Generative AI or language models.
